posts.post_content:
I'm taken Offer's on Mr. Cross's Ghost Taday!
The Prices on these have been somewhat "Ball Park Figure's!?", 
So I thought I'd See How it turns Out!?
Mr. Cross is Kinda Breathing Down His Own Neck... :rolleyes:

If You have Any E90-1's that I might need, 
either to Find a Permanent Home in My Working Set 
or maybe even an Up Grade... a Trade is Always Welcome!

Outside of E90-1's,...
Matty's, McGraw's or Walsh's are a Good Focus of mine...
Don't hesitate to Ask... 
Ya Just Never What Might Come Ta Be!?!?

Thanks Fir Your Consideration...

"Life's Grand... Aye!!!"
